text: Straight, not bent.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Of an angle, having a size of 90 degrees, or one quarter of a complete rotation; the angle between two perpendicular lines.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Complying with justice, correctness or reason; correct, just, true.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Appropriate, perfectly suitable; fit for purpose.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Healthy, sane, competent.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: All right; not requiring assistance

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: On the right side.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Towards the right side.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Yes, that is correct; I agree.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: I agree with whatever you say; I have no opinion.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Signpost word to change the subject in a discussion or discourse.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Used to check agreement at the end of an utterance.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Used to add seriousness or decisiveness before a statement.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: That which complies with justice, law or reason.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: A legal or moral entitlement.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: The right side or direction.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: The ensemble of right-wing political parties; political conservatives as a group.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: To correct.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: To set upright.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: To return to normal upright position.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Exactly, precisely.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: Very, extremely, quite.

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: According to fact or truth; actually; truly; really

attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License
text: In a correct manner.

text: To a great extent or degree.
